primary_characteristics: Lack of sustained attention to task
communication_patterns.temporal_notes: Speech segments span from 00:00 to 06:01 in the audio (approximately 6.0 minutes)

representative_excerpts.text: Okay, Tyler, look at these pictures and tell me what's happening.
representative_excerpts.context: This excerpt shows the initial instruction given to Tyler, indicating the start of an interaction focused on observing and describing pictures.

representative_excerpts.text: Why you can't keep? [and for us.] telling the story that you see in this picture.
representative_excerpts.context: This snippet illustrates a brief exchange where the speaker provides instructions followed by a question from Tyler, demonstrating a quick back-and-forth conversation.

representative_excerpts.text: I can't do it. It's only poo. I look good.
representative_excerpts.context: This excerpt represents a short, fragmented statement from Tyler, highlighting his difficulty in engaging with the task and providing a brief commentary on his perception of himself.

representative_excerpts.text: What is this? Okay, Tyler, tell me the story is speaking. I got in it. I'm back on me.
representative_excerpts.context: This segment captures another brief exchange where Tyler responds to further instructions, showing his attempt to engage but still struggling with sustained participation in the activity.
